articles.author: Lillian Gissen
articles.title: Kate Middleton pays tribute to Princess Diana as she arrives to the US with Prince William - Daily Mail
articles.description: Kate, 40, and Prince William, 40, arrived in Boston on Wednesday, and the Princess of Wales channeled her late mother-in-law by opting for a very sentimental piece of jewelry.
articles.content: Kate Middleton paid tribute to her late mother-in-law by wearing a pair of stunning sapphire and diamond earrings that once belonged to Princess Diana as she arrived in America alongside Prince Willi… [+6749 chars]
